headline.main: Scottish Investors Standard Life, Aberdeen Mull $13.5 Billion Tie-Up
headline.print_headline: Scottish Investors Standard Life, Aberdeen Mull $13.5 Billion Tie-Up

lead_paragraph: Standard Life and Aberdeen Asset Management, two of Scotland's most well-known financial firms, are in talks over an 11 billion pound ($13.5 billion) tie-up to create Britain's largest investment manager.
snippet: Standard Life and Aberdeen Asset Management, two of Scotland's most well-known financial firms, are in talks over an 11 billion pound ($13.5 billion) tie-up to create Britain's largest investment manager....
